text: All majesty and glory, O my God, and all dominion and light and grandeur and splendor be unto Thee.
All-praise be to Thee, O Lord my God! I know not how to sing Thy praise...
All praise be to Thee, O my God! Thou beholdest my helplessness and poverty...
All praise be unto God Who was Ever-Existent ere created things were called into being, when there was no one else besides Him.
All praise, O my God, be to Thee Who art the Source of all glory and majesty, of greatness and honor...
Bless Thou, O King of Kings, the city of New York!
Create in me a pure heart, O my God...
Dispel my grief by Thy bounty...
Exalted art Thou, O Lord my God!
Faded now is all that erstwhile flourished in the Paradise of Thy transcendent oneness, O my God!
From the sweet-scented streams of Thine eternity give me to drink...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Every man of insight confesseth Thy sovereignty...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Every time I venture to make mention of Thee, I am held back by my mighty sins...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I beseech Thee by Him Who is Thy Most Great Name...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I beseech Thee by Thy Chosen Ones, and by the Bearers of Thy Trust...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I give Thee thanks inasmuch as Thou hast called me into being in Thy days...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I implore Thee by the onrushing winds of Thy grace
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I yield Thee thanks for having enabled me to recognize the Manifestation of Thyself...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I yield Thee thanks for that Thou hast made me the target...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Thou hast, in Thine all highest Paradise...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Thou seest me dwelling in this prison-house...
Glorified art Thou, O my compassionate Lord!
Glorified art Thou, O my God! I yield Thee thanks...
Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! Thou art He the fire of Whose love hath set ablaze the hearts...
Glorified be Thou, O my God!
Glorified be Thy name, O Lord my God! I beseech Thee by Thy power...
Glorified be Thy name, O Lord my God! Thou beholdest my dwelling-place, and the prison into which I am cast...
Glory be to Thee, O God! Thou art the God Who hath existed before all things...
Glory be to Thee, O King of eternity, and the Maker of nations, and the Fashioner of every moldering bone!
Glory be to Thee, O Lord my God! Abase not him whom Thou hast exalted...
Glory be to Thee, O Lord my God! I beg of Thee by Thy Name...
Glory be to Thee, O Lord my God! I implore Thee by Thy Name...
Glory be to Thee, O Lord my God! Make manifest the rivers of Thy sovereign might...
Glory be to Thee, O Lord my God!
Glory be to Thee, O my God! My face hath been set towards Thy face...
Glory be to Thee, O my God!  Thou hearest Thine ardent lovers lamenting in their separation from Thee...
Glory be unto Thee, O God. How can I make mention of Thee while Thou art sanctified from the praise of all mankind.
Glory be unto Thee, O Lord, Thou Who hast brought into being all created things...
Glory be unto Thee, O Lord! Although Thou mayest cause a person to be destitute of all earthly possessions...
Glory be unto Thee, O Lord my God! Nothing whatsoever escapeth Thy knowledge...
Glory be unto Thee, O Lord my God! I beg Thee to forgive me and those who support Thy Faith.
Glory be unto Thee, O Lord of the world...
Glory be unto Thee, O my God! Verily, this thy servant and this Thy maidservant have gathered...
Glory to Thee, O my God! But for the tribulations...
Glory to Thee, O my God! One of Thy handmaidens, who hath believed in Thee and in Thy signs...
Glory to Thee, O my God! The first stirrings of the spring of Thy grace have appeared...
He is God, exalted is He, the Lord of loving-kindness and bounty!
He is God! How can we render Thee thanks, O Lord?
He is God! O God, my God! These are servants attracted in Thy days by the fragrances of Thy holiness...
He is God! O God, my God! Bestow upon me a pure heart, like unto a pearl.
He is God! O Lord, my God, my Well-Beloved! These are servants of Thine...
He is God! O Lord my God! O Thou Helper of the feeble...
He is God! O peerless Lord! In Thine almighty wisdom Thou hast enjoined marriage upon the peoples...
He is God! Thou seest us, O my God, gathered around this table...
He is the All-Glorious!
He is the Bestower, the Bounteous!
He is the Compassionate, the All-Bountiful!  O God, my God!
He is the Gracious, the All-Bountiful!
He is the Gracious, the Well-Beloved!
He is the Healer, the Sufficer, the Helper, the All-Forgiving, the All-Merciful.
He is the King, the All-Knowing, the Wise!
He is the Mighty, the Pardoner, the Compassionate!
He is the prayer-hearing, prayer-answering God!
How can I choose to sleep, O God...
How can I praise Thee, O Lord, for the evidences of Thy mighty splendour...
How numerous the souls...
I adjure Thee by Thy might, O my God!
I am aware, O Lord, that my trespasses have covered my face with shame in Thy presence...
I am he, O my Lord, that hath set his face towards Thee, and fixed his hope on the wonders of Thy grace and the revelations of Thy bounty.
I bear witness, O my God, that Thou hast created me to know Thee and to worship Thee.
I beg Thee to forgive me, O my Lord, for every mention but the mention of Thee...
I beg Thy forgiveness, O my God, and implore pardon after the manner Thou wishest Thy servants to direct themselves to Thee.
I beseech Thee, O my God, by all the transcendent glory...
I beseech Thee, O my God, by Thy mighty Sign...
I give praise to Thee, O my God, that Thou hast awakened me out of my sleep...
I give praise to Thee, O my God, that the fragrance of Thy loving-kindness hath enraptured me...
I have wakened in Thy shelter, O my God...
I have risen this morning by Thy grace, O my God, and left my home trusting wholly in Thee, and committing myself to Thy care.
I know not, O my God, what the Fire is which Thou didst kindle in Thy land.
I magnify Thy Name, O my God...
In His Name, the Exalted, the All-Highest, the Most Sublime!
In the Name of God, the Lord of overpowering majesty, the All-Compelling.
In the Name of God, the Most Ancient, the Most Great.
In the Name of God, the Most High!  Lauded and glorified art Thou, Lord, God Omnipotent!
In the Name of Him Who hath been promised...
In the name of Thy Lord, the Creator, the Sovereign, the All-Sufficing...
Is there any Remover of difficulties save God?
Lauded and glorified art Thou, O my God! I entreat Thee by the sighing of Thy lovers...
Lauded and glorified art Thou, O Lord my God!  Thou art supreme over the realm of being and Thy power pervadeth all created things.
Lauded be Thy name, O Lord my God! Darkness hath fallen upon every land...
Lauded be Thy Name, O Lord my God! I am Thy servant who hath laid hold on the cord of Thy tender mercies...
Lauded be Thy name, O Lord my God! I entreat Thee by Thy Name through which the Hour hath struck...
Lauded be Thy name, O Lord my God! I testify that Thou wast a hidden Treasure wrapped within Thine immemorial Being...
Lauded be Thy name, O Lord my God! Thou dost witness that Thy will hath prevailed over all created things...
Lauded be Thy name, O Lord my God! Thou seest me in this day shut up in my prison...
Lauded be Thy Name, O Lord our God!
Lauded be Thy name, O my God! Thou beholdest how the tempestuous winds of tests...
Lauded be Thy name, O my God! Thou beholdest me in the clutches of my oppressors.
Lauded be Thy name, O my God and the God of all things...
Lauded be Thy name, O my God!  I am so carried away by the breezes blowing from Thy presence...
Lauded be Thy name, O my God! I entreat Thee...
Lauded be Thy name, O Thou Who beholdest all things and art hidden from all things!
Light and glory, greeting and praise be upon the Hands of His Cause...
Lord! Pitiful are we, grant us Thy favor...
Magnified art Thou, O Lord of the entire creation...
Magnified art Thou, O Lord my God! I ask Thee by Thy Name...
Magnified be Thy name, O God, the Lord of heaven!
Magnified be Thy name, O Lord my God! Behold Thou mine eye...
Magnified be Thy name, O Lord my God! I know not what the water is with which Thou hast created me...
Magnified be Thy name, O Lord my God, inasmuch as Thou hast inclined mine ear to Thy voice...
Magnified be Thy Name, O Lord my God! Thou art He Whom all things worship and Who worshipeth no one...
Magnified be Thy name, O my God, for that Thou hast manifested the Day...
Magnified be Thy name, O Thou in Whose grasp...
Magnified, O Lord my God, be Thy Name, whereby the trees of the garden of Thy Revelation have been clad...
Make firm our steps, O Lord, in Thy path and strengthen Thou our hearts in Thine obedience.
Many a chilled heart, O my God, hath been set ablaze...
My God, my Adored One, my King, my Desire!
My God, my Fire and my Light!
My God, Whom I worship and adore! I bear witness unto Thy unity and Thy oneness...
My Lord! My Lord! I praise Thee...
O compassionate God! Thanks be to Thee for Thou hast awakened me and made me conscious.
O Divine Providence! Bestow Thou in all things purity and cleanliness upon the people of Bahá
O Divine Providence!  Lift to Thy lovers' lips a cup brimful of anguish.
O Divine Providence! This assemblage is composed of Thy friends...
O God, and the God of all Names, and the Maker of the heavens!
O God! Dispel all those elements which are the cause of discord...
O God! Educate these children.
O God, guide me, protect me, make of me a shining lamp and a brilliant star.
O God, my God! Aid Thou Thy trusted servants to have loving and tender hearts.
O God, my God! Be Thou not far from me...
O God, my God! I have set out from my home, holding fast unto the cord of Thy love...
O God, my Master, the Goal of my desire!
O God, my God! Fill up for me the cup of detachment from all things...
O God my God! I beg of Thee by the ocean of Thy healing, and by the splendors of the Daystar of Thy grace...
O God, my God! I have turned in repentence...
O God, my God! Illumine the brows of Thy true lovers, and support them with angelic hosts of certain triumph.
O God, my God!  I implore Thee with a throbbing heart...
O God, my God, my Beloved, my heart's Desire.
O God, my God! Praise be unto Thee...
O God, my God! Shield Thy trusted servants from the evils of self and passion...
O God, my God! These are Thy feeble servants; they are Thy loyal bondsmen and Thy handmaidens...
O God, my God! This is Thy radiant servant...
O God, my God! This Thy handmaid is calling upon Thee, trusting in Thee, turning her face unto Thee...
O God, my God! Thou art my Hope and my Beloved, my highest Aim and Desire!
O God, my God! Thou beholdest...
O God, my God! Thou seest how black darkness...
O God, my God! Thou seest me...
O God, my God! We are servants of Thine...
O God! O God! From the unseen kingdom...
O God! O God! This is a broken-winged bird...
O God! O God! Thou seest my weakness...
O God, O Thou Who hast cast Thy splendor over the luminous realities of men...
O God our Lord! Protect us through Thy grace from whatsoever may be repugnant unto Thee...
O God!  Rear this little babe in the bosom of Thy love...
O God! Refresh and gladden my spirit.
O God! The trials Thou sendest...
O God, Who art the Author...
O holy Lord! O Lord of loving-kindness!
O Lord! Enable all the peoples...
O Lord! I am a child; enable me to grow beneath the shadow of Thy loving-kindness.
O Lord, I have turned my face unto Thy kingdom of oneness...
O Lord! In this Most Great Dispensation Thou dost accept the intercession of children in behalf of their parents.
O Lord! Make these children excellent plants.
O Lord! Make this youth radiant...
O my Lord, my Beloved, my Desire!
O Lord my God! Assist Thy loved ones...
O Lord, my God and my Haven in my distress!  My Shield and my Shelter in my woes!
O Lord, my God! Praise and thanksgiving...
O Lord, my God! This is a child...
O Lord, O Thou Whose mercy hath encompassed all...
O Lord! Provide for the speedy growth...
O Lord! Render victorious
O Lord!  Thou art the Remover of every anguish...
O Lord! Unto Thee I repair for refuge, and toward all Thy signs I set my heart.
O my God, aid Thou Thy servant...
O my God and my Master! I am Thy servant and the son of Thy servant...
O my God and my Master!  Thou seest me among Thy creatures...
O my God, my Lord and my Master!
O my God! O Forgiver of sins and Dispeller of afflictions!
O my God! O my God! Glory be unto Thee for that Thou hast confirmed me to the confession of Thy oneness...
O my God, O my Lord, O my Master!
O my God! O my God! This, Thy servant, hath advanced towards Thee...
O my God! O my God! Thou seest me...
O my God! O my God! Thou seest these children...
O my God! O my God! Unite the hearts...
O my God! O my God! Verily, I invoke Thee...
O my God! O my God! Verily Thy servant, humble before the majesty of Thy divine supremacy...
O my God! O my God! Verily, these servants are turning to Thee, supplicating Thy kingdom of mercy.
O my God! O Thou forgiver of sins, bestower of gifts, dispeller of afflictions!
O my God, the God of bounty and mercy!
O my God! There is no one but Thee to allay the anguish of my soul, and Thou art my highest aspiration, O my God.
O my God!  This is Thy servant and the son of Thy servant who hath believed in Thee...
O my Lord and my Hope! Help Thou Thy loved ones to be steadfast in Thy mighty Covenant...
O my Lord! I have drawn nigh unto Thee, in the depths of this darksome night...
O my Lord! Make Thy beauty to be my food...
O my Lord, my Defender, my Help in peril!
O my Lord! O my Lord! I am a child of tender years.
O my Lord!  O my Lord! These two bright orbs are wedded in Thy love...
O my Lord! O my Lord! This is a lamp...
O my Lord! Thou knowest that the people are encircled with pain and calamities...
O Peerless Lord! Be Thou a shelter for this poor child...
Ordain for me, O my Lord, and for those who believe in Thee that which is deemed best for us in Thine estimation...
O Thou, at Whose dreadful majesty...
O Thou compassionate Lord, Thou Who art generous and able!
O Thou forgiving God! These servants are turning to Thy kingdom and seeking Thy grace and bounty.
O Thou forgiving Lord! Although some souls have spent the days of their lives in ignorance...
O Thou forgiving Lord! Thou art the shelter of all these Thy servants.
O Thou incomparable God!
O Thou kind and loving Providence!
O Thou kind Lord! Bestow heavenly confirmation...
O Thou kind Lord! From the horizon...
O Thou kind Lord! Graciously bestow...
O Thou kind Lord!  O Thou Who art generous and merciful!
O Thou kind Lord! Praise be unto Thee...
O Thou kind Lord! These are Thy servants who have gathered in this meeting...
O Thou kind Lord! These lovely children are the handiwork of the fingers of Thy might...
O Thou Kind Lord! This dearly cherished maidservant was attracted to Thee
O Thou kind Lord! This gathering is turning to Thee.
O Thou kind Lord!  Thou hast created all humanity from the same stock.
O Thou kind Lord! We are servants of Thy Threshold...
O Thou Lord of the Kingdom!
O Thou loving Provider! These souls have hearkened to the summons of the Kingdom...
O Thou merciful God! O Thou Who art mighty and powerful!
O Thou most glorious Lord! Make this little maidservant of Thine blessed and happy...
O Thou, my God, Who guidest the seeker...
O Thou peerless Lord! Let this suckling babe be nursed...
O Thou Provider! Thou hast breathed over...
O Thou the Lord of the visible and the invisible, and the Enlightener of all creation!
O Thou Who art the Lord of all names and the Maker of the heavens!
O Thou Whose face is the object of my adoration...
O Thou Whose face is the object of the adoration of all that yearn after Thee...
O Thou Whose nearness is my wish...
O Thou Whose tests are a healing medicine...
Praise and glory be to Thee, O Lord my God!
Praise be to Thee, O Lord, my Best Beloved!
Praise be to Thee, O Lord my God! I am the one who hath sought the good pleasure of Thy will...
Praise be to Thee, O Lord my God! I beseech Thee...
Praise be to Thee, O Lord my God! I implore Thee, by Thy Name which none hath befittingly recognized...
Praise be to Thee, O Lord my God! I swear by Thy might!
Praise be to Thee, O Lord my God! Thou seest and knowest that I have called upon Thy servants to turn nowhere except in the direction of Thy bestowals...
Praise be unto Thee, O Lord. Forgive us our sins, have mercy upon us and enable us to return unto Thee.
Praise be unto Thee, O Lord my God! We have observed...
Praise be unto Thee, O my God! I am one of Thy servants, who hath believed on Thee and on Thy signs.
Praise be to Thee, O my God! These are Thy servants who are attracted by the fragrances...
Praised and glorified art Thou, O God!
Praised be Thou, O God, my God!
Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! This is Thy servant who hath quaffed from the hands of Thy grace the wine of Thy tender mercy...
Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Every time I am reminded of Thee and muse on Thy virtues...
Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Graciously grant that this infant be fed...
Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! I implore Thee by Them Who are the Tabernacles of Thy Divine holiness...
Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! I implore Thee by Thine Ancient Beauty and Most Great Name...
Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! I implore Thee, by Thy Most Great Name...
Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Every time I attempt to make mention of Thee, I am hindered by the sublimity of Thy station and the overpowering greatness of Thy might.
Praised be Thou, O my God, that Thou hast ordained Naw-Rúz...
Praised be Thou, O Lord my God! Thou art He Who hath created all things...
Praised be Thou, O my God! Thou seest me shut up in this Prison...
Remove not, O Lord, the festal board...
Say: God sufficeth all things, and nothing in the heavens or in the earth but God sufficeth.
Say: Magnified be Thy Name...
Send down Thy blessings, O my God, upon the Tree of the Bayán...
Strengthen my hand, O my God, that it may take hold of Thy Book...
Suffer me not, O God, my God, to be kept back from the heaven of Thy bounties...
Suffer me, O my God, to draw nigh unto Thee, and to abide within the precincts of Thy court...
The praise which hath dawned from Thy most august Self...
These are, O my God, the days...
This is, O my God, the first of the days...
Thou art He, O my God, through Whose names the sick are healed and the ailing are restored...
Thou beholdest, O my God, the Day-Star of Thy Word shining above the horizon of Thy prison-city...
Thou beholdest, O my God, Thy servant who dwelleth in this prison-house...
Thou knowest full well, O my God...
Thou knowest, O God, and art my witness that I have no desire in my heart save to attain Thy good pleasure...
Thou seest me, O my God, bowed down in lowliness, humbling myself before Thy commandments...
Thou seest me, O my Lord, with my face turned towards the heaven of Thy bounty and the ocean of Thy favor...
Thou seest, O my God, how the wrongs committed by such of Thy creatures...
Thou seest, O my God, how Thy loved ones have been encompassed...
Thou seest, O my Lord, my dwelling-place in the heart of this mountain and Thou dost witness my forbearance.
Thy name is my healing, O my God, and remembrance of Thee is my remedy.
Thy unity is inscrutable, O my God, to all except them that have recognized Him Who is the Manifestation...
Unto Thee be praise, O Lord my God! I beseech Thee by Thy Most Great Name Who hath been shut up in the prison-town of 'Akká...
Unto Thee be praise, O Lord my God!  I entreat Thee, by Thy signs that have encompassed the entire creation...
Unto Thee be praise, O Thou Who inclinest Thine ear...
Verily I am Thy servant, O my God, and Thy poor one and Thy suppliant and Thy wretched creature.
Vouchsafe unto me, O my God...
